main: ^While driving alone, you swear you hear a tree talking to you.
FirstChoice: ^You stop and listen intently. It's just the wind rustling the leaves, but now you feel a bit silly and slightly unnerved. (Your sanity -1)
SecondChoice: ^You keep driving, shaking off the weird experience. Trees can't talk... right? (Nothing happens)
ThirdChoice: ^You talk back to the tree, having a full-blown conversation. It's absurd, but you feel strangely amused by your own antics. (Your happiness +1)
